definition: an attempt to get something, to ask for or request earnestly
details:
noun
- an attempt to get something
= synonyms: play
- (bridge) the number of tricks a bridge player is willing to contract to make
= synonyms: bidding
- a formal proposal to buy at a specified price
= synonyms: tender
- an authoritative direction or instruction to do something
= synonyms: command, dictation, bidding
verb
- to ask for or request earnestly
= example: to ask for or request earnestly
= synonyms: press
- to make a serious effort to attain something
= example: to make a serious effort to attain something
- to propose a payment
= example: to propose a payment
= synonyms: tender, offer
- to make a demand, as for a card or a suit or a show of hands
= example: to make a demand, as for a card or a suit or a show of hands
= synonyms: call
